In England, in the seven days to 04 August, there were 162,262 new confirmed cases (286.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 July, there were 167,270 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (5,008 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 August is 5,324,191 (9,415 cases per 100,000 population).
